info.name: video mirror
info.additionalInfo:
This will not work with the obsolete FLASH technique! Don't worry, serious sites are using HTML5 as a default anyway.

There is a myth going on, claiming you could legalize a ripped video through mirroring. Honestly?! Maybe they can fool youtube with it, but never an advocate.
This is the fix, but it can also be useful for studying of dancing steps.

Don't forget to disable again after the video.
